import { useParams} from "react-router-dom" import { Card,Container,Image,Table, Button } from "react-bootstrap" import NavHeader from './navbar' import Footer from './footer' import navStyle from './navbar.module.css' import { NumericFormat } from "react-number-format" import ModalDetailPayment from "./modal-transaction" import { useState } from "react" import moment from "moment/moment" // import logo from '../.png' function Payment({data, total,count}){ const params = useParams() const storage = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("name")) const dataTrip = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("trip")) const [Show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true) const handleClose = () => setShow(false) // const date = ; return( <> {dataTrip.filter((list,index) => index + 1 == params.id).map((list, index) => ( {/* Quote */}

Booking

Saturday, 22 Juy 2020

{list.title}

{list.country}

Waiting Payment

Date Trip
{moment(list.date).format('ll')}
Accomodation
{list.accomodasi}
Transportation
Qatar Airways
Duration
6 Day 4 Night

upload payment proof
No Full Name Gender Phone
1 {storage.fullname} Male {storage.number} Qty : {count}
Total :
{/* */} {/* */}
))}
) } export default Payment
